title: Research Property Deed History
description: A client is interested in the ownership history of a historic home. The agent needs to research the property's deed history.

tasks.description: Access the county recorder's online database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully navigates to the public records search portal.

tasks.description: Search for the property by address or parcel number to find all recorded documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a list of all deeds, mortgages, and liens associated with the property.

tasks.description: Summarize the chain of title, listing the previous owners and sale dates for the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear, chronological summary of the property's ownership history.
